overview: The entrepreneurial duo Tobias and Benjamin arrive at serial entrepreneur Allan Dyrkj√¶r's castle to get an investment. But no one opens the door, and when Allan claims they don't have a deal, Benjamin has to fight to be allowed to pitch for his idol. Tobias is more lukewarm about the welcome they receive from the enigmatic billionaire, so the cracks in the partnership begin to show.
title: Kold kanvas
